impositionOffenceDetails.details:
FIDICI - Fined and detained in default of payment until court rises
To be detained in the courthouse until the court rises. Total amount enforced £2222.00.
FO - Fine
Fined £100.00
FVS - Surcharge
To pay a surcharge of £50.00
PDATE - Pay by date
Pay by date. Date to pay in full by: 11/03/2025.
